item.title: Install Helm Charts
item.description: Helm charts can be installed using helm install command. Each install requires a release and same chart can be installed multiple times with different release.

item.title: Helm Chart
item.description: Helm chart is combining template and values where templates are kubernetes resource files with values placeholders and these placeholders get populated from the values.yaml file provided.

item.title: Helm
item.description: Helm is a tool to manage kubernetes resource files. It packages the resource files in projects. These packages can then be installed and run using helm. It is a package manager for kubernetes.

item.title: Custom Resource Controller
item.description: A custom resource controller is required to operate on custom resources. Solely creating custom resource does not mean anything. It requires a controller to operator on custom resource to give some meaningful business.

item.title: Custom Resource Definition
item.description: Custom Resource Definition Custom Resource Definition is the feature of kubernetes where it allows us to create custom resources which do not exist in kubernetes.

item.title: Metaclass
item.description: Metaclass type is the class which all classes derive. It is responsible for the creation for the class. Metaclasses are rarely used. If we want to customize creation of classes, we would need custom metaclass.
